Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The two other siblings , apparently healthy at 12 ( 1 / 2 ) and 15 years , respectively , and their father , apparently healthy as well , presented ARSA and GS values within the range of MLD patients .

Let's think step by step.

1. MLD (Mucopolysaccharidosis Type A): MLD is a metabolic disorder or lysosomal storage disease caused by a deficiency of the enzyme ARSA (iduronate sulfatase). The siblings and their father having ARSA and GS (likely a marker for MLD) values within the range of MLD patients suggests they may have the disease.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
